idea:
flybig â€“ is a Scheduled Commuter Airline launched by Big Charter Private Limited.  

In conjunction with the UDAN initiative, flybig, India's newest friendly regional airline, provides connectivity to destinations that were hitherto not accessible by air.

Our reason for existence will be based on providing a continuum of a warm family atmosphere on all of our flights whilst providing connectivity and convenient timings for travel.

India poised to become third largest air passenger market by 2025; Domestic Market to quadruple over the next two decades. Flybig plans to be the dominant Regional Airline by 2025

360 Degree integrated flexible business model; Multiple Revenue Streams with Superior Customer experience

One of the most technically sound aviation management team in India

The Company will adopt a risk mitigated model to operate for the next three years and needs to scale up to meet the fleet requirement to service UDAN Routes.

idea:
Hello, 

we are team dhargalkar supermarket. founded in 2017 by Mr. Sagar A. Dhargalkar in mumbai. initially we have started from organic grocery home delivery to customers. later we also stated to sale it to high rated hotels. 

in 2020 we started to sale Regular groceries too and developed our own android application by our inhouse team. currently we are having 3 registered outlets and 5 distributed small delivery points which are managing from home in mumbai, thane, navi mumbai, dombivali from different locations. our grocery products discounts are very compititive and we are the one of the brands who delivery grocery in 90minutes with best discount. our aim is to have our outlet in every pincode of india and with this respective we want to change the grocery requirement and delivery supply chain to be faster than now. we take order from Android application, Whatsapp & on toll free no too. We give customer various options to place an order. if customer is in vehical and they want to pick the order from outlet. they can order from our app and their grocery bag will be ready in 20minutes to pick. we have already developed our own unique SOP's, Business model, T & C, Policies, Frenchisee model. we are Trackking & running very conciously towards our Aim. i am happy to know this startup india platform.
name: Dhargalkar Corporation

idea:

idea:
It is an online aggregator which helps in providing various option of service centre for repair & servicing  of your two wheeler


1. Build online Differential pricing option from nearby garages  as per customer location

2. Price is generated as per two wheeler predefined problems

3. easy for women to get their two wheeler service/repaired while sitting at home

4. Multiple payment option

5. This idea will help in reducing garage monopoly
name: ACCELERATE ONLINE SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED
